hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salamah bin Rawh bin Zinba', that :his grandfather came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and he had castrated a slave of his. The Prophet (ﷺ) manumitted the slave in compensation for having been mutilated

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ مَثَّلَ بِعَبْدِهِ فَهُوَ حُرٌّ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Mutilates His Slave, Then He (The Slave) Is Free
